intro: Family-friendly puzzle game that will challenge your logical thinking in a fantastic world where every STEP is meaningful!
description:
Play as one of the available Slimes and explore wonderful biomes that you need to bring new colors to. Be careful as you have to adapt to a brand new mechanic in each and every biome!

Every step matters so think through your every move in order to get the DIAMOND score! Get to know the way and optimize your strategy to complete levels with the lowest number of moves possible!

Pick your favorite Slime and complete challenging routes to unlock fun and unique skins, as well as other biomes!

Don't forget to bring your friend with you and compete in special modes for TWO players!



PUZZLE GAME FOR EVERYONE

	Play at your own pace
	Test yourself and train your brain


BEAUTIFUL VISUALS

	Handmade pixel art graphics
	Handcrafted biomes and ways to complete levels
	Charming Slime skins and colors

CONTENT

	Infinite number of autogenerated challenge levels
	100 Handcrafted campaign levels
	3 Fascinating biomes
	6+ Unique mechanics
	20+ Slime skins to unlock
	6 Beautiful colors for each skin

COUCH VERSUS

	Unique experience each time you play
	Become the Slime Champion by competing locally with your friend
